item.title: 波音公司动荡之年的五张图表
item.description: 波音公司全年都深陷危机之中。【原文：Boeing has been mired in crisis all year.】

item.title: 科幻烟雾弥漫：投资者和专家对特斯拉推出机器人出租车的反应
item.description: 特斯拉周四展示了期待已久的机器人出租车，它有两个鸥翼车门，没有方向盘或踏板，但这场华丽的活动细节不多，令希望获得更多具体计划的投资者大失所望。【原文：Tesla on Thursday showcased its long-awaited robotaxi with two gull-wing doors and no steering wheel or pedals, but the glitzy event was light on detail, disappointing investors who had hoped for more concrete plans.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称德国正努力挫败联合信贷银行对德国商业银行的竞购
item.description: 几位熟悉德国政府和监管机构想法的人士告诉路透社记者，德国正在努力阻止意大利竞争对手可能收购德国最大的银行之一，这一立场将柏林与罗马和欧洲监管机构对立起来。【原文：Germany is working to frustrate a possible takeover of one of its biggest banks by an Italian rival, a stance that pits Berlin against Rome and Europe's regulators, several people familiar with government and regulators' thinking told Reuters.】

item.title: 卢拉抨击美国要求提供巴西购买战斗机的信息
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周五表示，美国司法部要求萨博公司提供有关巴西于2014年购买瑞典鹰狮战斗机的信息是 "毫无意义的"。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said on Friday it made "no sense" for the U.S. Department of Justice to request information from Saab over Brazil's purchase of the Swedish firm's Gripen fighter jets in 2014.】

item.title: 降息观点导致美国股票基金资金外流
item.description: 截至 10 月 9 日的一周内，由于市场对美联储降息路径的预期发生变化以及债券收益率飙升，投资者纷纷获利了结，美国股票基金出现资金外流。【原文：U.S. equity funds witnessed outflows in the week to Oct. 9 as investors booked profits due to a shift in market expectations about the Federal Reserve rate cut path and a surge in bond yields.】

item.title: 交易员继续押注美联储 11 月和 12 月降息 25 个基点
item.description: 周五，一份报告显示，上个月的生产者价格与上个月相比没有变化，这表明通胀继续朝着美联储的目标迈进，因此在即将召开的美联储政策会议上将美国利率下调四分之一个百分点的理由似乎不攻自破。【原文：The case for quarter-point U.S. interest-rate cuts at upcoming Federal Reserve policy meetings appeared intact on Friday after a report showed producer prices were unchanged last month compared to the prior month, suggesting inflation continues on track toward the Federal Reserve's target.】

item.title: 因经营疲软，穆迪将大众汽车前景展望下调至 "负面
item.description: 评级机构穆迪（Moody's）将大众汽车的评级展望从 "稳定 "下调至 "负面"，理由是欧洲第一大汽车制造商的经营业绩不断恶化，预计扭转局面将面临挑战。【原文：Rating agency Moody's has cut its outlook on Volkswagen to "negative" from "stable", citing a deteriorating operating performance at Europe's top carmaker and expected challenges to turn the situation around.】

item.title: 美国 9 月份生产者价格保持不变
item.description: 美国生产者价格在 9 月份保持不变，表明通胀前景依然有利，并支持了美联储将在下个月再次降息的观点。【原文：U.S. producer prices were unchanged in September, pointing to a still-favorable inflation outlook and supporting views that the Federal Reserve would cut interest rates again next month.】

item.title: 由于安全产品需求旺盛，Fastenal 季度利润略超预期
item.description: 受益于对安全产品的持续需求，工业用品制造商法斯顿（Fastenal）周五公布的第三季度利润略高于分析师的预期。【原文：Industrial supplies maker Fastenal on Friday posted a third-quarter profit that marginally surpassed analysts' estimates, benefiting from a sustained demand for its safety products.】

item.title: 瑞典法院维持对特斯拉劳资纠纷的裁决
item.description: 瑞典一家地方法院周五维持了一项初步裁决，即瑞典邮政服务公司 Postnord 无需向特斯拉交付车牌，而特斯拉的车牌正受到邮政工人的阻挠，这也是更广泛的工会同情罢工的一部分。【原文：A Swedish district court on Friday upheld a preliminary ruling that Sweden's postal service Postnord does not need to deliver licence plates to Tesla , which are being blocked by the postal workers as part of a wider labour union sympathy strike.】

item.title: 全球货币市场基金连续第三周吸引资金流入
item.description: 截至 10 月 9 日的一周内，受美联储降息预期减弱和对中东冲突保持谨慎的影响，全球投资者对货币市场基金进行了大量投资。【原文：Global investors made large investments in money market funds in the week to Oct. 9 driven by a push back in Federal Reserve rate cut expectations and caution over the Middle East conflict.】

item.title: 尽管需求放缓，电动汽车公司 Polestar 预计第四季度毛利率仍将保持正增长
item.description: Polestar 上周五表示，尽管第三季度电动汽车的交付量下降了 14%，但预计第四季度将实现正毛利率。【原文：Polestar said on Friday that it expected to achieve a positive gross profit margin in the fourth quarter despite its electric vehicle deliveries falling 14% in the third quarter.】

item.title: 在激烈的美国大选中，世界市场最关心的是什么？
item.description: 美国总统大选还有几周就要举行了，这是大选年中对金融市场影响最大的一次投票。【原文：The U.S. presidential election, the most consequential vote for financial markets in an election-packed year, is weeks away.】

item.title: Meta 在摩尔多瓦总统选举前删除虚假账户
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc 周五表示，在摩尔多瓦 10 月 20 日大选之前，该公司已经删除了一个针对该国俄语使用者的群组账户网络，原因是该账户违反了公司关于虚假账户的政策。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc said on Friday it had removed a network of group accounts targeting Russian-speakers in Moldova, ahead of the country's Oct. 20 election, for violation of the company's policy on fake accounts.】

item.title: 印尼要求苹果和谷歌封杀中国的特姆优，以保护小商户
item.description: 印尼一位部长周五表示，印尼已要求Alphabet旗下的谷歌和苹果公司在其应用商店中屏蔽中国快时尚电子商务公司Temu，使其无法下载。【原文：Indonesia has asked Alphabet's Google and Apple to block Chinese fast fashion e-commerce firm Temu in their application stores in the country so it cannot be downloaded, a minister said on Friday.】

item.title: 富国银行利润因利息收入减少而下降
item.description: 富国银行第三季度利润下降，原因是贷款需求低迷和向储户支付的款项增加挤压了该行的利息收入。【原文：Wells Fargo's profit fell in the third quarter as the bank's interest income was squeezed by subdued loan demand and higher payments to depositors.】

item.title: 摩根大通利润下降，贷款损失准备金使投资银行业务黯然失色
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）周五表示，由于为潜在贷款违约计提的更多准备金抵消了投资银行业务的收益，该行第三季度利润下降。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's profit dropped in the third quarter as a bigger provision for potential loan defaults offset gains from investment banking, the bank said on Friday.】

item.title: TomTom 首席执行官：中国贸易紧张局势给汽车制造商的投资计划蒙上阴影
item.description: 数字地图专家TomTom公司首席执行官周五表示，中国与西方之间的贸易紧张局势已经对汽车制造商的投资决策和长期前景造成了影响，给行业带来了一定程度的不确定性。【原文：Trade tensions between China and the West have put a dampener on carmakers' investment decisions and longer-term outlooks, creating a level of uncertainty in the industry, the CEO of digital mapping specialist TomTom said on Friday.】

item.title: 纽约银行第三季度利润增长，托管和管理资产规模突破 50 万亿美元
item.description: 全球最大的托管银行纽约银行周五表示，由于其托管和管理的资产首次突破 50 万亿美元大关，投资服务费增加，第三季度利润猛增 16%。【原文：BNY's profit jumped 16% in the third quarter on higher investment services fees as assets under its custody and administration exceeded the $50 trillion mark for the first time, the world's largest custodian bank said on Friday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯法院在 VTB 诉讼案中下令扣押摩根大通 1.558 亿美元资金
item.description: 法庭文件显示，俄罗斯一家法院已下令扣押摩根大通银行在俄罗斯的账户中总计 1.558 亿美元的资金，俄罗斯国有银行 VTB 因资金被冻结在国外而寻求赔偿。【原文：A Russian court has ordered the seizure of funds in JPMorgan Chase bank accounts in Russia totalling $155.8 million, court filings showed, as state-owned Russian bank VTB seeks damages over funds blocked abroad.】

item.title: 晨星 DBRS 将米尔顿保险损失估计下调至 300 亿至 600 亿美元
item.description: Morningstar DBRS 分析师马科斯-阿尔瓦雷斯（Marcos Alvarez）周五表示，飓风米尔顿造成的保险损失可能在 300 亿至 600 亿美元之间，低于信用评级机构在飓风来袭前的最高估计。【原文：Insured losses for Hurricane Milton are likely to range between $30 billion and $60 billion, Morningstar DBRS analyst Marcos Alvarez said on Friday, below the credit ratings agency's highest estimates before the hurricane hit.】

item.title: 欧盟要求特穆提供信息，说明其为打击非法产品销售而采取的措施
item.description: 欧盟委员会说，它已根据《数字服务法》（DSA）向购物网站 Temu 发出了信息请求，要求 Temu 提供信息，说明它正在采取哪些措施阻止非法产品在其平台上销售。【原文：The European Commission said it had sent a request for information to shopping website Temu under the Digital Services Act (DSA), asking Temu for information on steps it was taking to stop illegal products being sold on its platform.】

item.title: 在竞选的最后几天，特朗普的减税承诺来势迅猛
item.description: 共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）大约每周推出一次新的减税提案，在竞选的最后冲刺阶段以不同寻常的匆忙姿态来动摇选民的选票，而在这场选举中，几千张选票就可能决定胜负。【原文：Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump is rolling out a new tax-cut proposal about once a week in an unusual rush in the final stretch of the campaign to sway voters in an election that could be decided by just a few thousand votes.】

item.title: 早间竞标：美联储 "跳票 "加入战局，大型银行提交报告
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国法官将听取对波音公司致命空难认罪协议的反对意见
item.description: 一名联邦法官将于周五举行听证会，审议在两起波音 737 MAX 飞机坠毁事故中遇难人员的亲属对这家美国飞机制造商承认合谋欺骗监管机构的协议提出的异议。【原文：A federal judge is set to hold a hearing on Friday to consider objections from relatives of people killed in two Boeing 737 MAX crashes to the U.S. planemaker's agreement to plead guilty to conspiring to defraud regulators.】

item.title: 贝莱德 11.5 万亿美元资产创历史新高，得益于市场反弹和 ETF 的推动
item.description: 周五，贝莱德管理的资产连续第三个季度创下历史新高，这主要得益于该公司旗下交易所交易基金的资金流入量激增，以及股市大幅上涨提升了客户的投资价值。【原文：BlackRock's assets under management hit a record high for the third straight quarter on Friday, helped by surging inflows to the company's exchange-traded funds and a searing equity rally that boosted the value of its clients' investments.】

item.title: 投资者为财报季做好准备，期权下跌；特斯拉下挫
item.description: 在第三季度财报季拉开帷幕之前，美国股指期货周五走低，此前9月份通胀数据好于预期，巩固了美联储11月份降息25个基点的预期。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Friday, ahead of the third-quarter earnings season kickoff, after hotter-than-expected September inflation data solidified expectations for a 25-basis-point rate cut by the Federal Reserve in November.】

item.title: 欧盟与中国的电动汽车争端：法国干邑集团准备应对后果
item.description: 在法国西部这个葡萄种植区，白兰地生产商们正为欧盟与中国之间的贸易争端所带来的影响而焦虑不安，而克里斯托夫-布埃塔尔（Christophe Bouetard）比大多数人都更加忧心忡忡。【原文：In this grape-growing region of western France, where brandy producers are fretting over the fallout from a trade dispute between the European Union and China, Christophe Bouetard is more worried than most.】

item.title: 大众汽车第三季度交付量下降，证实欧洲汽车业面临挑战
item.description: 大众汽车集团周五报告称，第三季度全球交付量下降了 7%，显示出欧洲汽车行业面临的挑战程度。【原文：Volkswagen Group reported a 7% decline in third-quarter global deliveries on Friday, showing the extent of challenges faced by the European auto sector.】

item.title: 美国回购活动激增可能加剧资金压力
item.description: 隔夜回购协议的急剧稳步上升使作为美国政府证券短期借款中间人的银行不堪重负，有可能在每季度末和年末加剧重大的资金压力。【原文：A sharp steady rise in overnight repurchase agreements is overwhelming banks that serve as middlemen for such short-term borrowings in U.S. government securities, threatening to fuel major funding pressure at the end of every quarter and year.】
